events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The shipping is way past the expected date.
The message was reviewed and categorized under delivery delay due to keywords indicating late shipping and delay.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specializing in shipping and delivery issues.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have received so far? This will help us investigate the delay.
Thanks for your response. My order number is 123456789, but the tracking status hasn’t updated since shipment two weeks ago.
We’ve contacted the courier for an update and can offer a priority reshipment or a full refund if the package cannot be located within five business days.
I appreciate your help and would like to go ahead with the priority reshipment option. Please keep me posted on the progress.
Your reshipment has been processed. You will receive new tracking details shortly. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that your reshipped order has arrived safely and that everything is satisfactory with your purchase.
Since we haven’t heard back regarding any further issues, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
